message: I believe in living authentically and chasing what sets your soul on fire. Life is too short to follow someone else’s path. I find peace in quiet moments—whether it’s capturing a sunrise through my lens or pushing my limits at the gym. I’m always learning, always growing. I value deep connections and meaningful conversations. If you’re open to exploring the world with curiosity and courage, I’d love to walk this journey with you. Let’s make every day count.
cn_prompt: 画面中的男士正对着镜头讲话，镜头固定。他神情专注，目光直视镜头，偶尔微微点头，配合语言表达。他穿着深色外套，耳戴银色圆环耳钉，整体造型简约而有型。背景为纯净浅灰，突出人物主体。
en_prompt: The man in the image is speaking directly to the camera with a fixed shot. He maintains a focused expression, looking straight into the lens, occasionally nodding slightly to accompany his speech. He is wearing a dark-colored jacket and silver hoop earrings, with an overall simple yet stylish appearance. The background is a clean, light gray, emphasizing the subject.
